attributes.additional_details:
It is now more than obvious that the Privatisation of Gas and Electricity has not as intended provided competition thus resulting in acceptable Gas and Electricity Bills.
Instead these companies have plotted together to go hand in hand and deliberately hike their prices to an absolute ridiculous rate creating unacceptable profits on their behalf.
These companies are robbing the British people blind and will continue to do so until the Government steps in, its now high time to Nationalise both these companies again, before they kill yet more thousand of people who cannot afford their ludicrous prices this winter.
